arts.ttl: Lyon vs PSG – Luis Enrique doesn’t mince words after the victory
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain defeated Olympique Lyonnais 3-2 this Sunday at Parc OL in Matchday 12 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. After the match, PSG coach Luis Enrique spoke to Ligue 1+. Luis Enrique: “It’s about resilience.” Fatigue and relief tonight? Like after every match, fatigue. Was it tough? It’s normal when you play against a […]

arts.ttl: Paris Saint-Germain scores another last-gasp winner to beat Lyon and stay top
arts.sum: Host Lyon equalized four minutes later when Zaïre-Emery failed to track Afonso Moreira’s run behind him following a long ball and the Portuguese striker slotted into the left corner. Lyon’s defenders failed to track João Neves on a corner from the left and the midfielder headed in from close range five minutes into added time, one week after Gonçalo Ramos headed home in the final seconds of stoppage time against Nice.

arts.ttl: Lyon vs PSG – Neves’ powerful words after the victory
arts.sum: João Neves, the 21-year-old Paris Saint-Germain midfielder, spoke to Ligue1+ after the 3-2 victory against Olympique Lyonnais this Sunday at Parc OL in Matchday 12 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. He emphasized the success, even though there is still work to be done. Neves: “A very difficult match for us. We still have things […]

arts.ttl: Lyon/PSG Highlights (2-3): Neves Emerges as Parisian Hero!
arts.sum: Catch the full Lyon/PSG highlights featuring goals from Warren Zaïre-Emery, Afonso Moreira, Khvicha Kvaratskhelia, and Ainsley Maitland-Niles. In a thrilling clash at Groupama Stadium, Paris Saint-Germain edged out Lyon 3-2 in Matchday 12 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season — despite moments of shaky control from the visitors. Watch: Lyon/PSG Highlights and All Goals Relive […]

arts.ttl: Lyon vs PSG – Paris’ ratings: errors, players struggling, but Neves saves the match
arts.sum: This Saturday, during the first matchday of the 2025-2026 Champions League, Paris Saint-Germain faced Olympique Lyonnais at Groupama Stadium. After a match where the Red and Blue are clearly struggling at the moment, thanks to Joao Neves, they managed a last-gasp 3-2 victory. Here are our player ratings for the Parisians. Goalkeeper – Lucas Chevalier […]

arts.ttl: Lyon 2-3 PSG: João Neves strikes late to send champions top of Ligue 1
arts.sum: Lyon host PSG to conclude Ligue 1's MD 12 with many key players missing out tonight's showpiece. The hosts were without midfield controller Corentin Tolisso

arts.ttl: Lyon vs PSG – Live pre-match coverage of the Parisians
arts.sum: This Sunday, as part of Matchday 12 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) faces Olympique Lyonnais (6th) at the Parc des Princes. While kickoff is at 8:45 PM CET, the club invites you to follow the pre-match preparations, including the players’ warm-up, starting at 7:45 PM. Watch the live stream here as […]

arts.ttl: Lyon vs PSG – Fonseca wants an ambitious OL despite everything
arts.sum: This Sunday at 8:45 PM (CET), Paris Saint-Germain (1st) faces Olympique Lyonnais (6th) at Groupama Stadium for Matchday 12 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. In a press conference, Lyon coach Paulo Fonseca spoke about the upcoming match and their Parisian opponent. The Portuguese manager knows his team will have to contend with the European […]

arts.ttl: Lyon vs PSG – Luis Enrique wants to show the resilience of his players
arts.sum: Luis Enrique, coach of Paris Saint-Germain (1st), held a press conference this Saturday ahead of facing Olympique Lyonnais (6th) at Groupama Stadium on Sunday (kick-off at 8:45 pm, CET) for Matchday 12 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. arts.ttl: Lyon vs PSG – Lyon’s presentation: European ambitions despite financial difficulties
arts.sum: This Sunday, November 9th, Paris Saint-Germain faces Olympique Lyonnais at Groupama Stadium (kick-off at 8:45 PM, CET) for Matchday 12 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. And as before every match, here’s a look at PSG’s opponent. Lyon’s situation – Lyon is emerging from a period of significant sporting and financial turmoil. Several coaches have […]
